value.0: Hello...  Unfortunately I can do nothing for you here without a mithril weapon forged by the Dwarves.

Oh!  It's been years since I've seen one of these quivers.  I can enchant it for you though I will need 1,000,000gp to complete the process.  Which kind would you like? *

*NOTE: You can only have one of each type of magical ammunition maker currently
Oh!  It's been years since I've seen one of these weapons.  Yes, I can enchant it for you.  Though I will need 1,000,000gp to complete the process.  Let me know when you're ready.

Let me explain how the process works, you may choose two 2d8 elemental damages, two 2d8 exotic damages (Divine, Magical, Negative, Positive), and two 2d12 physical damages.  You can only enchant an item once.

Your Mithril Weapon will have:
<CUSTOM7777>
 Are you sure this this is what you want?
You can only enchant a Mithril weapon  once.
You must have a mithril weapon or gaunts equipped!
I have a Mithril Quiver.  I'd like you to enchant it for me.
Never mind, I don't want one.
No.  On second thought I don't want one.
I have Mithril Gauntlets can you enchant them for me?
I have come from Gribigorn and have a Mithril Weapon.  Can you enchant it for me?
